name: XRView.eye
description: The XRView interface's read-only eye property is a string taken from the XREye enumerated type, indicating which eye's viewpoint the XRView represents: left or right. For views which represent neither eye, such as monoscopic views, this property's value is none.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The XRView interface's read-only eye property is a string taken from the XREye enumerated type, indicating which eye's viewpoint the XRView represents: left or right. For views which represent neither eye, such as monoscopic views, this property's value is none.
